maple (genus Acer)

(Simplified: 枫)
Pictophonetic: 風 indicates the sound; 木 (tree) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
楓樹 [ fēng shù ]: maple
楓葉 [ fēng yè ]: maple leaf
楓木 [ fēng mù ]: maple
楓香樹 [ fēng xiāng shù ]: Chinese sweetgum (Liquidambar formosana)
楓糖 [ fēng táng ]: maple syrup
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 風 [ fēng ] wind; air; customs, manners; news
heisig_chinese_memo: How do you know if a tree is a maple tree? Easy: Just stand next to the tree on a windy day, and if you get covered in maple syrup, it's a maple tree.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tree that does well in the wind is a maple tree. Maple trees don't have fruit so the wind can't knock anything off of it. That's why they thrive well in windy places!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture a bunch of maple trees being blown by the wind. They don't seem upset, they actually seem really happy.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: When the wind goes through the maple tree you know it's kite day (かえで)!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine your kite in the maple tree.
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 冂 (перевёрнутая коробка), 木 (дерево), 虫 (насекомое), 風 (ветер)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the windy (風) tree (木) is a maple
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I leave a huge dish under the maple tree so I can catch it's delicious syrup when it drops during the windstorm.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " wood ", " wind " sound. " Maple " is the name of a tree, that is, maple or sweetgum. "Said Wen": "Maple, wood. Thick leaves and weak branches, good at shaking. One 𣠞. From wood, wind sound." "Erya. "Shi Mu": "Maple, 欇欇." Guo Pu's note: "Maple trees are like white poplars, and the leaves are divergent, with fat and fragrant. Today's Liquidambar is." Such as "Chu Ci. "Calling the Soul": "There are maples on the water of Zhanjiang River, and it hurts Chun's heart from a thousand miles away." "Hou Han. "Ma Rong Biography": "The plants are surrounded by bamboos in the mysterious forest, the mausoleum of the vassal tombs cover the capital, the rare forests of trees, built woods, chrysanthemums, wu, chinensis, cypress, cabinets, willows, maples, poplars, Fengtong to Wei, 鴟頟It's cool."

"Shan Hai Jing. "The Southern Classic of the Great Wilderness": "There is wood on the mountain, and the name is maple. Maple, which Chi You abandoned its shackles, is called maple." Guo Pu's note: "Chi You was acquired by the Yellow Emperor. The weapon turns into a tree.” Legend has it that the maple was transformed by Chi You's shackles. The leaves of the maple tree turned red because of the blood of Chi You.

Many literary works mention the characteristics of maple leaves turning red in autumn. For example, Xie Lingyun of the Eastern Jin Dynasty "Late out of Xixietang": "Xiaoshuang Fengye Dan, the evening is cloudy." Du Fu of the Tang Dynasty "Ten Rhymes of Paintings on the Minshan Tuojiang River in Fengguan Yanzheng Hall": "The dark valley is not Guanyu. Red maple is not frost." Du Mu <Mountain Walk>: "Parking and sitting in the maple forest night, frost leaves red in February flowers."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " wood ", " wind ", the name of the tree, namely maple or sweetgum.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「風」聲。「楓」是樹木名，即楓樹或楓香樹。《說文》：「楓，木也。厚葉弱枝，善搖。一名𣠞。从木，風聲。」《爾雅．釋木》：「楓，欇欇。」郭璞注：「楓樹似白楊，葉員而岐，有脂而香，今之楓香是。」如《楚辭．招魂》：「湛湛江水兮上有楓，目極千里兮傷春心。」《後漢書．馬融列傳上》：「其植物則玄林包竹，藩陵蔽京，珍林嘉樹，建木叢生，椿、梧、栝、柏，柜、柳、楓、楊，豐彤對蔚，崟頟槮爽。」

　　《山海經．大荒南經》：「有木生山上，名曰楓木。楓木，蚩尤所棄其桎梏，是謂楓木。」郭璞注：「蚩尤為黃帝所得，械而殺之，已摘棄其械，化而為樹也。」傳說楓木是蚩尤的枷鎖所化。楓樹的葉子因為染上蚩尤的血而變紅。

　　很多文學作品都會提到楓葉在秋天變紅的特點。如東晉謝靈運〈晚出西謝堂〉：「曉霜楓葉丹，夕曛嵐氣陰。」唐代杜甫〈奉觀嚴鄭公廳事岷山沱江畫圖十韻〉：「暗谷非關雨，丹楓不為霜。」杜牧〈山行〉：「停車坐愛楓林晚，霜葉紅於二月花。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「風」聲，樹木名，即楓樹或楓香樹。

楓字的基本解释

楓
fēng
见“枫”。

楓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fēng］
［《廣韻》方戎切，平東，非。］
“枫1”的繁体字。
(1)木名。即枫香树。因其叶经霜变红，有“红枫”、“丹枫”之称，故古诗词中，秋令红叶植物也称“枫”。
(2)槭属植物俗也称枫。如元宝枫、鸡爪枫等。

楓字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　楓； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页539第08
【唐韻】方戎切【集韻】【韻會】方馮切【正韻】方中切，?音風。【說文】木也。厚葉弱枝善搖。一名?。【爾雅·釋木】楓，欇欇。【郭註】樹似白楊，葉圓岐，有脂而香，今之楓香是也。【埤雅】枝善搖，故字从風，葉作三脊，霜後色丹，謂之丹楓，其材可以爲式。　又【說文解字】楓木，漢宮殿中多植之，故稱楓宸。　又【南方草木狀】楓香樹，子大如鴨卵，曝乾可燒，惟九眞郡有之。　又【蜀本草】楓脂，入地千年化爲虎魄。　又【本草圖經】引《述異記》：南中楓木之老者爲人形，亦呼爲靈楓，蓋癭瘤也。【譚景升化書】老楓化爲羽人，無情而之有情也。又孫炎云：欇欇生江上，有寄生枝，高三四尺，生毛，一名楓子，天旱，以泥泥之卽雨。　又【集韻】悲廉切，音砭。義同。　又【唐韻】方愔切，音近分。【張衡·西京賦】木則樅栝椶楠，梓棫楩楓。嘉卉灌叢，蔚若鄧林。　又【唐韻】符咸切，音凡。【楚辭·招魂】朱明承夜兮時不可淹，臯蘭被徑兮斯路漸，湛湛江水兮上有楓。　又【集韻】甫凡切，音䒦。與杋同。

楓字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
楓字的起名意思

同“枫”。

maple
Basic explanation of words
maple
fēng
See "Maple".
maple
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fēng］
["Guangyun" Fang Rongqie, Pingdong, Fei. ]
Traditional characters for "枫1".
(1) Wooden name. The sweetgum tree. Because its leaves turn red after frost, they are called "red maple" and "red maple". Therefore, in ancient poetry, the red leaf plant of autumn is also called "maple".
(2) Acer plants are also commonly known as maple. Such as Acer truncatum, Japanese maple and so on.
maple
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wooden Word Department] 　 Feng; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 539-08
[Tang Yun] Fang Rongqi [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Fang Fengqi [Zheng Yun] Fang Zhongqie, sound style. [Said the text] Mu Ye. Thick leaves and weak branches shake well. One?. 【Erya·Shimu】Feng, 欇欇. [Guo's Note] The tree resembles white poplar, the leaves are round, with fat and fragrant, which is the same as the sweet gum today. 【Piya】The branches are good at shaking, so the characters follow the wind, and the leaves are the three ridges. After the frost, the color is red, which is called red and maple, and its material can be style.　 Also [Shu Wen Jie Zi] Maple was planted in the Han palace, so it was called Fengchen.　[Southern grass and woods] Liquidambar, the seed is as big as a duck egg, it can be burned when exposed to dry, but it is found in Jiuju County.　[Shu Materia Medica] Maple fat, which has been in the earth for thousands of years, turned into a tiger spirit.　[This sketch book] quoted from "Shu Yi Ji": The old man of Nanzhong maple is in human form, and it is also called Lingfeng, and it is also covered with gall tumors. [Book of Tan Jingsheng Hua] Lao Feng turned into a feather man, ruthless and affectionate. Also Sun Yanyun: On the river, there are parasitic branches, three or four feet high, with hairs, a maple, drought, rain with mud.　[Jiyun] Pathetic and honest, sound Bian. The same meaning.　[Tang Yun] Fang cut, the sound is close to each other. 【Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu】Mu Zecong, 栝椶南, Zi 棫楩feng. Jiahui shrub, Wei Ruo Denglin.　[Tang Yun] Fu Xianqie, Yin Fan. [Songs of the Chu · Soul Recalling] Zhu Mingcheng should not be submerged in the night, Gaolan was gradually covered by the road, and there are maples on the water of Zhanjiang.　[Jiyun] Fu Fanqie, sound. Same as 杋.

Meaning Mnemonic
A tree that does well in the wind is a maple tree. Maple trees don't have fruit so the wind can't knock anything off of it. That's why they thrive well in windy places!
Picture a bunch of maple trees being blown by the wind. They don't seem upset, they actually seem really happy.
Reading Mnemonic
When the wind goes through the maple tree you know it's kite day (かえで)!
Imagine your kite in the maple tree.
